errorCode.1: Pump Runtime Alarm - The pump cannot move enough nutrient.
errorCode.3: Battery Voltage is too low to dose reliably.
errorCode.4: Conductivity reading has exceeded the alarm level {{alarm_level}} µS/m.
errorCode.5: The conductivity sensor has stopped communicating with the doser.
errorCode.7: No Nutrient Alarm - The pump failed to move any nutrient.
errorCode.8: Conductivity reading exceeded the skip level {{conductivity_skip_level}} µS/m for {{conductivity_skip_limit}} consecutive doses.
errorCode.9: Hourly water flow limit {{water_flow_limit}} L/Hour exceeded.
errorCode.10: Memory error - DIT Technicians will check and reset settings.
